Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I have finally taken the step off to space. I hope and know that it will be an awesome journey.

Dudley

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've taken the plunge. It truly is a wonderful game, and there are few of its kind out there.

If you need any help getting started, I'd highly recommend taking a look at the tutorials on the Drawing Board (link in my sig). Don't be afraid to ask questions in the How To section, either, as the people there tend to be highly knowledgeable about the game from long hours of experience and experimenting.

Happy landings!
